case.state: I'm a trainer, a researcher, a mythologist, and Pokemon League Champion; but you may call me Cynthia.
This will be such fun! No holds barred!
Wait, huh? There's no men here... I thought... I only joined because... Well, never mind that. Let's get this battle started!
~Cards~ cards, please.
~Cards~ cards, please.
~Cards~ cards, please.
I'll just swap out... ~cards~.
~Cards~ please...
Give me some good ones, dealer.
I'll trade these in...
Come on dealer, let's see what you got for me.
But of course; a hand like this is only natural to me.
But of course; this game comes natural to me, after all.
I'm as talented as ever.
Hah! As expected...
Ah, a hand fit for a champion!
What do you say, after this game, does anyone want to explore any ruins with me?
This hand... So it's a fair fight!
Does anyone have any juicy historical stories to share? I love hearing about the past.
Such a bad hand? That's fine, I enjoy the challenge.
This hand... It isn't great.
So I'm cursed with a bad hand? What is this, a kind of handicap? ...You'll need it.
It appears that I'll have to win this hand through skill alone.
My hand isn't the best, ~player~. This is your opening, make it count!
(Hmmm... I might be losing my first safe layer here...)
(My coat might have to go...)
I... I can still make this work... probably...
Now's your chance, ~player~! I have a pretty bad hand, so this is your chance to strike!
(Hmmm... I might be losing my last anticipated layer here...)
Now's your chance, ~player~! I have a pretty bad hand, so this is your chance to strike!
My hand isn't the best, ~player~. This is your opportunity!
I won't let this end yet! This match is too fun to let it end this easily!
Oh! I think I figured out why people are staring! It's because ~naked~ is naked!
Oh, but of course! I've finally figured out why people are staring! It's because ~naked~ is naked!
Oh, my gosh do I feel silly. people are staring because we're playing strip poker!
This is the first time I've gone into a library for any reason other than research...
Why, I'm very fond of libraries, but playing strip poker in one? It's Unheard of...
Why, I remember this library very well... I frequent this library to polish up on ancient mythology.
Why, this library is one of my favorites! I know every nook and cranny.
After this game, I kind of want to search a few of these aisles... I bet I could find some good books if I look hard enough...
Huh... I'm looking at that shelf of books over there and I think I've read every single one of them...
Mythologies from Sinnoh, Myths of Atlantis, One Hundred Stone Etchings That Will Turn Your Head... Yep, I've read all of those...
I've been here so often, I know this library like the back of my hand! There's a small cafe down stairs of anyone's wants a snack after the game...
I still can't place it... Why is everybody staring at us?
I can't seem to figure out why everyone is staring at us; our group isn't so big as to be causing a ruckus...
Why are people staring, do you think? Is someone's hair too unkept?
We're attracting an awful lot of attention... I can't seem to figure out why...
Do the people in this library really have nothing better to do than to stare at us?
I know this library quite well! There's a mythology section over there, astrophysics in that corner, and ~male~ can find his section on the seventh floor.
I know this library quite well! There's a mythology section over there, astrophysics in that corner... The porno section is on the seventh floor, ~male~, if that interests you...
I know this library like the back of my hand! The DVD rental desk is upstairs, ~male~; but I'm sorry to tell you, they don't carry any pornos.
I'm sorry, ~male~, but if you came to this library looking for a dirty magazine, they don't carry them here.
I'm sorry, ~male~, but if you came to this library looking for a porno film, they don't carry those here.
A know a lot of guys only come to libraries looking for porn... I'm sorry, ~male~, but this library doesn't carry any of that kind of stuff.
Do the think the five of us are making too much noise? This is a library, after all.
Five people can make a lot of noise; where is the librarian telling us to keep our voices down?
With five people here, I hope we aren't making too much noise...
Do you think we're being too loud? It's hard to keep a low volume with so many people around.
Do you think we're being too loud? It's hard to keep a low volume with so many people around.
It's probably best that our group isn't any larger; can you imagine how noisy we would get with five people?
I'd say it's a good thing there's only four of us here. We wouldn't want our group to get any louder than we already are; this is a library, after all.
I hope the librarians don't mind us playing like this; with only three people, we shouldn't be making too much noise...
It's a good thing there's only three of us here tonight; if there were any more, the librarians might kick us out for being too loud...
Hey, even if there's only the three of us, we should still be keeping our voices down...
Being just the three of us, I'm sure we won't distract the other visitors here...
Huh, there's only the three of us here so we shouldn't be making too much noise... But then, why is everyone staring at us?
Everyone's staring at us... Is it because we're too loud? Yeah, that must be it; this is a library after all.
Guys, be sure to keep your voices down; people are staring at us...
Guys, be sure to keep your voices down; people are looking in our direction...
Guys, we seem to be attracting a lot of attention... Do you think we're being too loud, or is it something else?
Huh, there's only the four of us here so we shouldn't be making too much noise... But then, why is everyone staring at us?
I mean, I understand that we're not the smallest group in the world, but I wouldn't have thought a group like ours would be attracting so many gazes...
Five cards? Don't... Don't you normally use six?
Call it a trainer's intuition, but we're getting close. Let's go on!
...Hey, ~player~, how long does it take to adjust yourself? ...W-wait, are you... ?!
...Hey, ~player~, how long does it take to adjust yourself? ...(Is he really adjusting himself, or... ?!)
...Hey, ~player~, how long does it take to adjust yourself? ...(Is he... masturbating? Through his clothes?)
Come on now, ~player~, it doesn't take that long to move your bits around. Quite jerking around and let's get back to this game!
Come on now ~player~, your forfeit isn't for a few more rounds. Finish adjusting yourself and play the next hand!
~Player~, you've... you've had your hand down there for a while now... Are you sure you're just adjusting yourself?
~Player~, you're still adjusting yourself? Ah! I had no idea it was such a complicated process!
~Player~, you should just be moving bits around... Jus... just what are you doing in down there?
Ahg, for the thousandth time, no! I do not have a daughter named Verity; I just happen to look like the girl's mother...
Ahg, for the thousandth time, no! I do not have a daughter named Verity; I don't have any kids for that matter.
Ahg, for the thousandth time, no! I do not have a daughter named Verity; I haven't even had any steady romantic partner, for that matter...
I should learn about the origins of this game... I'm sure strip poker has a long and interesting history!
I keep telling people that we need to be keeping a closer eye on Team Galactic, but no one seems to want to listen...
I don't frequent places like The Inventory that often; maybe I should come more often!
Is anyone thirsty? Drinks are on me tonight if you wanted to order anything!
I wouldn't normally play something like strip poker, but if guys like ~male~ were involved all the time, I might have to make myself a regular.
I've come to The Inventory a few times before, but I've never played strip poker here until now; when I saw there was a guy ready to play, I just had to join in!
I've come to The Inventory a few times before, although I've never joined in on the strip poker games here; that's because I've never seen any guys play before!
Did you guys want to take a quick break? We could grab ourselves a drink since we're already at the tiki bar!
Is anyone thirsty? Drinks are on me tonight if you wanted to order anything!
Since we're at the bar, does anyone want any drinks?
Maybe after the game, we can all hang out by the shore! How does that sound?
Is anyone up for swimming in the ocean after the game? Clothing will be optional!
Does anyone fancy a quick swim after the game?
Does anyone fancy a quick swim after the game? We'll already be naked anyway.
Has anyone seen the bartender? I could sure use a few drinks right about now...
Ugh, where's the bartender when you need him...
Do you think we can move this game somewhere more... private? Being out in public in my underwear isn't how I imagined my day would be going...
Can I reach behind the counter and grab myself something? I'm not sure I want to be waiting on the bartender to show up...
Ugh, where's the bartender when you need him...
I know it's against the rules to run away, but I hope you can understand my desire to jump into the sea right about now...
(I want to jump in the sea right now...)
Did you want to take a dip in the ocean after we finish up here, ~finished~? You could wash yourself off too!
It looks like you got pretty messy, ~finished~; care to take a dip with me after the game to clean yourself off?
Did you want to take a dip in the ocean after we finish up here, ~finished~? You could wash yourself off too!
It looks like you got pretty messy, ~finished~; care to take a dip with me after the game to clean yourself off?
Another crushing defeat by the hands of you two?
Another crushing defeat by the hands of you three?
Another crushing defeat? Even with all of you playing?
Huh? I had the worst hand out of everyone here? Impossible!
Ah! Not again!
Huh? Another loss? I'm beginning to lose count...
A-another defeat? B-but how? I swore I would be good at this game!
Ah! NO! I don't have any layers to spare!
Huh? NO! Not now! Not when I'm only down to my underwear!
What?! What?! B-but I'm on my last two layers! H-how did I... fail... like this...
Eaahh! W-what? H-how can I be losing like this? I'm a pokemon champion!
I'm impressed that you've come this far... You've certainly earned what I'm about to show you...
My first loss? Ahh-- I see there's a fire in your eyes after all! This could get exciting.
I see... So this might be a closer game than I had thought...
Ah, so careless! ...Very well, I'll remove my shoes.
Huh? So, it seems I've lowered my guard...
A... third loss? This is... *ahem* this is quite unexpected.
I see now that strip poker isn't as easy of a game as I thought. I'll... I'll take off my shirt now...
It looks like I've got a real fight on my hands! No more underestimating my opponents!
It seems as if I've got a real fight on my hands! I won't be underestimating my opponents any longer!
I've lost again... But this game is far from over!
Yes, I am a little embarrassed, but more than that, I'm fulfilling my part of tonight's agreement. There can be no wavering now!
Yes, I am a little embarrassed, but more than that, I'm fulfilling my part of today's agreement. There can be no wavering now!
I-I've taken off my shirt before in front of other girls, but never in front of any guys, huhee...
V-very well. If seeing others exposed was my reward for playing, it seems only fair that I give them their reward as well...
A-a-at least I'm not the first who has to do this... (I'm not that much of a loser...)
Whether it's the cold tundras of Snowpoint or the fiery peaks of Stark Mountain, I wear my coat everywhere I go.
You've done well to get me stripping. Enjoy it; it's the last you'll see.
You're doing well if you've got me taking off my scarf, but I had planned for this accordingly.
Well, no matter. Despite my carelessness, I will still come out on top.
I've changed in locker rooms before, but for some reason, taking my shirt off here seems more.. personal.
Despite this whole thing, I'm more excited than I am embarrassed; I must not allow myself to be defeated!
And yet, despite it all, I'm more excited than I am embarrassed; I will not sully my name with defeat!
Okay, this is the last defeat I can take! There can't be anymore!
I see that strip poker is not a game for the unprepared. You've earned your victories, so I must bare what the rules tell me to bare...
I played this game because I thought others would be stripping this nude... I had no idea there was anything realistically on the line on my end...
Yes, I am a little embarrassed, but more than that, I'm fulfilling my part of the game's agreement. There can be no wavering now!
H-hey! All it took was me taking off my bra and it made you hard?
(Whoa... I just took off my bra and it was enough to get ~player~ hard...)
~Player~! That made you hard? At least try to cover it up, will you?
...There, it wasn't easy, but I took off my br- w--h-he-hey! W-what is that in your pants ~player~?!
(Hm? Could it be? Is that... slight lump in his pants... Is he hard?)
(Hm? Could it be? Is that... slight lump in his pants... Did exposing my breasts really make him hard?)
(Hm? Could it be? Is that... slight lump in his pants... Hm? I-I think I can see it pulsating...)
(Hm? Could it be? Is that... slight lump in his pants... Hm? It... Did it just... twitch?)
~Player~... I know my breasts are exposed, but... you might want to hide your... situation down below a little better...
~Player~... I know my breasts are exposed, but... you might want to hide your... situation a little better... It's... bulging through your clothes.
~Player~? You... you might want to... adjust yourself down below... You can... reach in there if you need to, just... take control of the situation, okay?
~Player~, your... your dick is giving you away right now... I can see it though your clothes... Did... did I really get you that excited?
Looks like something's moving in your clothes, ~player~. You might wann- wai- hey, that's your dick! ~Player~!
Looks like something's moving in your clothes, ~player~. You might wann- wai- hey, that's your dick! ~Player~! That's gross!
Looks like something's moving in your clothes, ~player~. You might wann- wai- hey, that's your dick! ~Player~! ... So? Are you going to adjust yourself?
~Player~, you might wanna... adjust yourself down there... We can see it pulsing through your clothes. (Did taking off my bra really do that?)
Oh, ~player~... you're, uh... you're hard beneath your clothes, aren't you? Yeah, I can see it... You can reach in there and adjust yourself, if you need to...
~Player~... I know my breasts exposed, but... you might want to hide your, um... situation going on downstairs... It's distracting, to say the least.
Huh? Oh... Now that my shoes are off, it seems like it's a bit slippery around the ~background~.
I've held nothing back, yet it's come to this?
I've held nothing back, yet I'm down to on my last legs. You deserve the eye candy.
Hey, come on now, there's no need to stare!
Hey, come on now, there's no need to stare! And... no, I don't normally shave! I just decided to shave it last night just in case today's match went downhill for me.
I've held nothing back, yet it's come to this?
I've held nothing back, yet I'm down to on my last legs. You deserve the eye candy.
Hey, come on now, there's no need to stare!
Hey, come on now, there's no need to stare! And... no, I don't normally shave! I just decided to shave it last night just in case tonight's match went downhill for me.
I had expected at least a loss or two, although I hadn't expected it to happen so easily...
I've held nothing back, yet it's come to this?
I've held nothing back, yet I'm down to on my last legs. You deserve the eye candy.
I've held nothing back, yet I'm down to on my last legs here. May the best player win.
It's sure hard to get the motivation to try in this game when there's no guys around.
There. I'm sure my scarf will be the last item I take off!
There; and that's it. I do not expect to lose any rounds from here on out.
Okay, I'm done playing game; it's time to get serious!
Alright, so I can't sandbag against you... Big deal!
Alright, so I can't sandbag against you... Now, I'll actually try this time.
It seems as if you four are stronger opponents than I imagined! I'm going to start paying more attention!
It seems as if you four are stronger opponents than I imagined! I have to get my act together!
It seems as if you three are stronger opponents than I imagined! I'm going to start paying more attention!
It seems as if you three are stronger opponents than I imagined! I have to get my act together!
It seems as if you two are stronger opponents than I imagined! I'm going to start paying more attention!
It seems as if you two are stronger opponents than I imagined! I have to get my act together!
I had not expected this to be so easy as to not expect a loss or two, but that's it.
I had not expected this to be so easy as to not expect a loss or two, but you'll get no further than that.
I had even suspected a loss or two, so I had considered my coat a buffer before I
Just you wait and see! There's nothing an Elite Four champion can't handle!
Yeah, so I lost once more than I was expecting, big deal. Such a miscalculation will not happen again!
A loss is a loss; I need to determine what went wrong and learn from that mistake.
I'm... okay, I'm a little embarrassed. I never imagined I'd be backed into a corner like this!
There... there's your reward...
W-well? ... Gah, let's just get to the next round...
W-well? ... H-how do they... A-actually, never mind... Let's just start the next round.
I've held nothing back, yet it's come to this?
I've held nothing back, yet I'm down to on my last legs. You deserve the eye candy.
Hey, come on now, there's no need to stare!
Hey, come on now, there's no need to stare! And... no, I don't normally shave! I just decided to shave it last night just in case our match went downhill for me.
Huh? That's strange... The thought that I just took off my pants in front of others hasn't occurred to me until now; I was too absorbed by the intensity of this match!
(Wait, did I really just take off my pants in front of everyone? ... I didn't even realize; I was so absorbed by this match!)
Okay, that was the last defeat I can withstand for real...
That's it, no more safe options left! Let's do this!
Come on, N, you should really know what you're getting yourself into...
What, you didn't read the rules, N? That's on you, N; you need to be prepared!
Another victory? Ha, this comes easy.
My third win in a row? Just like I expected; I'm a natural!
I won? It seems strip poker comes as easily as mythological research.
That's another victory in the books!
Ah, ~name~'s turn? Show me something good!
You got off lucky these last few rounds, Catria; there's still a game underfoot!
You got off lucky these last few rounds, Catria; there's still a game underfoot, and I intend to win!
Another victory? Ha, this comes easy.
My third win in a row? Just like I expected; I'm a natural!
~Name~'s turn? I'm sure everyone has been looking forward to this.
I won? It seems that strip poker comes as easily as mythological research.
That's another win in the books!
A... Menger Sponge? Is that like a pokemon from Unova?
A... Menger Sponge? Is... Is that a pokemon I'm not familiar with?
A... Menger Sponge? Is that like a pokemon from your homeland?
Menger... Sponge? Is that a pokemon? I've never heard of a sponge pokemon before?
Mengers Ponge! Y-eah, I know that pokemon, totally! I wouldn't be the Sinnoh League champion if I didn't know about the Menegers Ponge pokemon.
Ha! I like the way you think, N! We're all trying to win first and foremost; must give ourselves every advantage possible while staying within the rules.
Ha! I like the way you think, N; I had thought you a villain before, but clearly you've more honor that I expected.
Yep! Thems the rules, N!
You would be correct, N.
How astute, N!
Yes, N. That's why it's called strip poker!
Ahhh, Red; now there's a name I haven't heard in a while. I wonder if he's finally ready for a rematch!
Red; now there's a name I haven't heard in a long while. I wonder how he's doing these days...
Ah, Red; now there's a name I haven't heard in while... We go way back, you see, and we've both studied alongside under Professor Oak.
Ah, your swag. Tell me, did you steal that from a jewelry store, or some poor girl?
Detective Looker will be happy to confiscate your swag for you once you've been apprehended.
Your bracelets? If you've stolen those from a jewelry store, Detective Looker will find out about it and you will pay for your crimes!
Ah, your swag. Tell me, did you steal that from a jewelry store, or some poor teenager?
Ha, custom-made? Don't lie to me; you stole those, didn't you...
That's ridiculous; you got a professional to make those glasses just for you and still turned out like that?
Ha, custom-made? I bet you stole those from a thrift store...
My my, N, you sure have an impressive head of hair! Quite like myself, if I must say.
Well, N, that's quite the head of hair; what kind of conditioner do you use?
I see that you too keep your hair well kept, N; kudos!
Well, you certainly have your hair-care down to a science!
I too take good care of my hair. Want to know the secret? My conditioner is made with honey from a Vespiquen hive!
I know they say that the best trainers wear hats, N, but I hope I'm proof enough that that's just a myth!
Oh, just take it off, silly. Your hair looks fine, N! Hee hee.
Come on, N, relax a little bit and let your hair down!
That cheap thing? Please, I bet you bought that from a children's accessory shop... Or stole it from one.
Why would you associate with the likes of Team Skull? Don't you have standards or something?
Ugh, just looking at thing is... unsettling.. Do you have any idea what that symbol stands for?
Ugh, just looking at thing is... unsettling.. That symbol is a symbol of ththieverynd arrogance.
No one can possibly take you seriously with that thing around you neck anyway, Guzma.
Oh, you're taking your ~clothing~ off? I didn't realize that counted.
Come on, ~name~, I know we're all playing to win here, but don't you think you could have been just a little more ambitious?
Bringing accessories is kind of cheap, but hey, anything to win, right?
Hmmm, don't take this the wrong way, N, but I wouldn't call your look stylish... It's more like... an intentional mess.
Hmmm, don't take this the wrong way, N, but you could learn a thing or two about style; your look is kind of just a drab collage of colors.
You're seriously willing to rep for those guys? Their childish crimes and petty thievery make them the laughing stock of Alola.
Team Skull's childish crimes and petty thievery is known even in Sinnoh; your organization is laughed about so widely and you're still willing to associate with them?
Are you proud of what your organization has become? I'd rip that thing off in a heart beat if I found it across my neck.
Are you proud of what your organization has become? I'd die of humiliation if I found that thing across my neck.
My my, N, you sure have an impressive head of hair! Quite like myself, if I must say.
Well, N, that's quite the head of hair; what kind of conditioner do you use?
I see that you too keep your hair well kept, N; kudos!
Well, you certainly have your hair-care down to a science!
I too take good care of my hair. Want to know the secret? My conditioner is made with honey from a Vespiquen hive!

You know, it's surprising... You're still the same Guzma as before, but you already look more respectable with that ridiculous chain off your neck.
You know, it's surprising... You're still the same Guzma as before, but you already look more respectable with that cheap trinket off your neck.
You know, it's surprising... Without that chain around you neck, you almost look respectable...
You know, it's surprising... Without that absurd knickknackk around you neck, you almost look respectable...

Get a grip, Guzma; I've encountered seasoned hikers with shoes in better condition...

Don't be so foolish, Guzma; my heels are much more suitable for me than those.

You needn't worry, Guzma; I wouldn't want to touch those nasty things anyway...
You needn't worry, Guzma; you couldn't pay me to come near those things...
I couldn't, with good conscience, come near those things anyway; if someone saw me next to stolen merchandise, they might get the wrong idea.
Let's take off something bigger next time, okay trooper?
Ha! What's wrong, Florina? Can't take the heat?

What's the matter, scared? Heh; your instinct to flee doesn't surprise me.
What's the matter, scared? Don't worry, most challengers who face me get the instinct to flee.

A woman taking off her ~clothing~... this is not why I decided to play this game.

Take them off Guzma, and admit defeat!
Looks like it's obvious who the winner will be between the two of us, Guzma; your boasts will have been for naught.
